marklogic.body: YOU BLACKS SHOULD BE HANGING FROM TREES. THAT'S WHAT HAPPENED BACK IN MY DAY, AND WE DIDNT HAVE PROBLEMS WITH YOU ANIMALS BECAUSE WE KEPT YOU IN LINE.....MY FATHER SET A WHOLE FAMILY OF YOU BLACKS ON FIRE AND HAD A BBQ OFF THEM. WE BURNED CROSSES IN YOUR BACK YARD AND THREATENED YOUR CHILDREN, MY DADDY RAN OVER A 5 YR OLD BLACK GIRL ON PURPOSE IN FRONT OF HER PARENTS AND GOT OUT AND STARTED BEATING ON THE FATHER. THATS THE ONLY WAY YOU BLACKS LEARN, YOU ARE A DRAIN ON THE TAXPAYER AND SHOULD BE SHIPPED BACK TO AFRICA IN CHAINS
